CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 22, 1964, pg. 15 reads: "Sweethearts All! - While charming Miss Vivian Robinson (center) was crowned queen of the Sweethearts Contest, given in connection with the testimonial for Mrs. Margaret Cauley, at Brown Chapel, recently, you surely will agree that these contestants are "sweethearts, all." They are (left to right) Jayne Ray, Malvee Turner, Miss Robinson, who reported $212.50 to win the title; Dorothy Brown and Evelyn Gregory. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eight men, boy, and fourteen women posed behind long banquet table in Brown Chapel AME Church for Margaret Cauley testimonial
